data.title: Latest News of Sumeet Raghavan
data.meta_description: Sumeet Raghavan News: Check out the latest news about Sumeet Raghavan along with Sumeet Raghavan movies, Sumeet Raghavan photos, Sumeet Raghavan videos and more on Times of India Entertainment.
data.text:
Let's leave Sarabhai.. alone, and not recreate it: Sumeet Raghavan

TNN / Feb 09, 2024, 08:00 (IST)

Sumeet Raghavan, who is best known as Sahil from the cult sitcom Sarabhai V/S Sarabhai, feels the show has had its day. “During our reunion in 2015, we shared a few pictures which got a fabulous response from our fans, which is why we brought season 2 and it was fun. But Season 2 was compared to the first season,” he said, adding, “Once a masterpiece is created, it’s best to not attempt any sequel/redux. Cult shows have their magic and fan following, they should remain untouched.” Excerpts from our chat with him on his recent visit to the city:

From actress to writer: Pariva Pranati pens down a few episodes for Wagle Ki Duniya

etimes.in / Feb 16, 2024, 16:27 (IST)

Wagle Ki Duniya is a relatable storytelling show that captures the essence of everyday life for the common man. It has aired 600 different stories spanning 900 episodes on Indian television. The show maintains freshness and innovation by embracing creativity from the cast and crew.

From advocating women’s safety to tackling child labour: Wagle Ki Duniya has been addressing daily social issues for three years

etimes.in / Feb 05, 2024, 15:55 (IST)

Celebrating three wonderful years of heartwarming storytelling, ‘Wagle Ki Duniya: Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey’ has truly made its mark on Indian television. Beyond providing entertainment, the show has been addressing daily social issues and encouraging open conversations. With its positive impact, relatable storytelling, Wagle Ki Duniya continues to be a powerful medium for positive change.

Sumeet Raghavan and Pariva Pranati on Wagle Ki Duniya completing 3 years

etimes.in / Jan 29, 2024, 13:56 (IST)

Against the dynamic setting of Mumbai, Wagle Ki Duniya skillfully portrays the challenges, pleasures, and victories of the everyday person. As the series marks its impressive three-year milestone, it remains a shining example of compelling storytelling. The exceptional cast is led by the talents of Sumeet Raghavan, Pariva Pranati, Bharti Achrekar, and Anjan Srivastava.

Wagle Ki Duniya: Sumeet Raghavan's singing journey as Rajesh mirrors his real-life passion for music

etimes.in / Jan 17, 2024, 20:34 (IST)

'Wagle Ki Duniya' showcases Rajesh's heartfelt pursuit of his lifelong dream of music, beautifully merging with Sumeet Raghavan's own passion for singing. The actor seamlessly integrates his love for music into his character, creating an authentic connection. Tune in to witness Rajesh's inspiring musical journey. When the cameras aren't rolling, the actor is often seen singing, playing the harmonium, and creating a musical mehfil.

Sumeet Raghavan, Mahesh Thakur, Nishant Malkani & Pariva Pranati share their New Year aspirations

IANS / Dec 31, 2023, 21:30 (IST)

Actors Sumeet Raghavan, Nishant Malkani, Mahesh Thakur, and Pariva Pranati share their year-end reflections and aspirations for the New Year. Sumeet values family and encourages everyone to cherish moments with loved ones. Nishant expresses gratitude for being part of the project 'Pashminna' and wishes his fans love and beautiful moments in the coming year. Mahesh sees the New Year as a fresh start, focusing on the success of the show 'Aangan Aapno Kaa' and hopes for joy and love for the viewers. Pariva emphasizes the importance of time and creating precious memories with family and friends.

Sumeet Raghavan's musical ode to Amitabh Bachchan

IANS / Nov 05, 2023, 16:21 (IST)

Actor Sumeet Raghavan paid a musical tribute to Amitabh Bachchan on the quiz show Big B. Bachchan was impressed by Raghavan's singing skills and asked him to perform for the studio audience and viewers at home. Raghavan sang a medley of Bachchan's songs, including "Chookar Mere Mann Ko" from the film Yaarana, "Salaam-E-Ishq Meri Jaan Zara Qubool Kar Lo" from Muqaddar Ka Sikandar, and "Pyar Hamen Kis Mod Pe" from Satte Pe Satta. Bachchan praised Raghavan's performance and expressed his respect for musicians.

Sumeet Raghavan's musical ode to Amitabh Bachchan

IANS / Nov 04, 2023, 17:55 (IST)

Actor Sumeet Raghavan paid a musical tribute to Amitabh Bachchan on the show 'Kaun Banega Crorepati' by singing three of his hit songs. Sumeet, along with his co-stars Pariva Pranati and Bharati Achrekar from the sitcom 'Wagle Ki Duniya - Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey', performed the medley of songs including 'Chookar Mere Mann Ko', 'Salaam-E-Ishq Meri Jaan Zara Qubool Kar Lo', and 'Pyar Hamen Kis Mod Pe'. Bachchan praised the performance and expressed his respect for musicians.

Wagle Ki Duniya: Atharva gets accused of being involved in a paper-leaking scandal

etimes.in / Dec 18, 2023, 18:43 (IST)

In recent episodes of 'Wagle Ki Duniya - Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey', the Wagles adapt to Rajesh's absence and Vandana imparts a valuable lesson to Atharva. Atharva finds himself at the center of a scandal at school when a leaked exam paper is discovered in his and Vidyut's bags. The accusation leaves Atharva accused of being involved in a paper-leaking scandal. The upcoming episodes will reveal whether Atharva and Vidyut succumbed to the pressure of studies or if they are being falsely implicated.

Wagle Ki Duniya: Atharva steps into his father Rajesh’s shoes and takes on his responsibilities

etimes.in / Dec 12, 2023, 17:02 (IST)

In the previous episodes of Wagle Ki Duniya, Rajesh is sent to Indore by his company, leaving the Wagle family feeling a void. In the upcoming episodes, Vandana challenges Atharva to step into his father's shoes for a day, underestimating the responsibilities shouldered by Rajesh. As Atharva assumes the role of the man of the house, he struggles with the weight of these responsibilities. This experiment makes him appreciate the unseen responsibilities his parents handle, and he learns valuable lessons through this unique experience.

Wagle Ki Duniya: Rajesh's accidental discovery of an LIC slip leads to justice for a deprived widow

etimes.in / Dec 06, 2023, 20:00 (IST)

'Wagle Ki Duniya - Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey' explores the challenges faced by a middle-class family. This week, Rajesh Wagle aims to impress a British delegate visiting his office. To do so, he decides to rent a two-piece suit, but while searching for one, he stumbles upon a hidden LIC number. Intrigued, Rajesh sets out on a mission to find the owner of the number and uncovers the heartbreaking story of a deceased man whose widow was denied compensation.

Wagle ki Duniya: A stray dog enters Sai Darshan Society sparking debate; here's what Sumeet Raghavan has to say

etimes.in / Nov 30, 2023, 01:00 (IST)

'Wagle Ki Duniya – Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey' delves into the daily challenges faced by a middle-class family. In recent episodes, the Wagles embraced foreign exchange student Karen and his lifestyle. The upcoming week brings a furry debate as a stray dog enters Sai Darshan Society, sparking discussions on caring for the stray versus the threat of dog bites. Sumeet Raghavan, portraying Rajesh Wagle, expresses excitement about the storyline, highlighting themes of compassion and community. Watch the emotional and challenging episodes every Monday to Saturday at 9.00 PM.

Monaz Mevawala enters Wagle Ki Duniya as Senorita Kapoor to plan Harshad’s high-society Diwali party

etimes.in / Nov 16, 2023, 20:00 (IST)

The TV show 'Wagle Ki Duniya – Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey' explores the challenges faced by a middle-class family. In recent episodes, the family attempted to live together for 15 hours, but conflicts arose, highlighting the difficulties of coexistence. A new character, Senorita Kapoor, played by Monaz Mevawala, will be introduced in upcoming episodes. She is an event planner hired to organize a high-society Diwali party, leading to a dilemma for Harshad, who must decide whether to invite his middle-class friends.

KBC 15: Amitabh Bachchan introduces a noble initiative of planting 100 trees with contestants' every correct answer, says "With 100 Litre ghee, 100 kg of rice and wheat flour, we will support Roti Bank"

etimes.in / Nov 04, 2023, 21:30 (IST)

The upcoming Diwali celebration on Kaun Banega Crorepati 15 will feature a noble initiative announced by Amitabh Bachchan. The initiative involves planting 100 trees for every correct answer given by a contestant and supporting Roti Bank with food supplies. Bachchan also revealed that his father had translated five plays by Shakespeare and shared his favorite adaptation of Hamlet. Sumeet Raghavan mentioned his performance in Marathi theatre as Hamlet.

Wagle Ki Duniya's Rajesh Wagle aka Sumeet Raghavan cooks an omelet in the vanity room; says "Kisi pe bharosa mat rakhiye"

etimes.in / Nov 02, 2023, 11:15 (IST)

The Wagle Ki Duniya cast, including Sumeet Raghavan and Pariva Pranati, will be seen on Kaun Banega Crorepati 15. In a behind-the-scenes video, Sumeet was seen cooking his own meal in the vanity room. He emphasized the importance of self-reliance and shared that he carries a gas stove and a frying pan with him. The Wagles also engaged in a game of "Never Have I Ever" with the host, Amitabh Bachchan, and Bharati Achrekar requested a dance with him.

Kaun Banega Crorepati 15: Wagle Ki Duniya cast to be part of the show; Bharati Achrekar dances with host Amitabh Bachchan on 'Ude Jab Jab Zulfein Teri'

etimes.in / Oct 29, 2023, 12:29 (IST)

The popular TV show Kaun Banega Crorepati season 15 is currently airing its family week. A recent promo revealed that the cast of 'Wagle Ki Duniya' will be visiting the show. Sumeet Raghavan, Bharati Achrekar, and Pariva Pranati will be playing the game and answering tough questions. The promo also shows Sumeet Raghavan singing a song for Amitabh Bachchan, who joins in for a dance later. The show continues to be loved by audiences of all age groups, as seen by a lady blowing flying kisses at Amitabh Bachchan during a recent episode.

Rupali Ganguly reunites with Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai cast Rajesh Kumar, Satish Shah and others; says, “Some friendships last a lifetime”

etimes.in / Aug 29, 2023, 17:50 (IST)

Rupali Ganguly, known for her role in Anupamaa, recently reunited with her old friends from the cast of Sarabhai vs Sarabhai. She shared a video of their reunion on social media, showing them having a great time and reminiscing about old memories. Fans expressed their excitement and love for the reunion. In an interview, Rupali expressed her desire for another season of Sarabhai vs Sarabhai, stating that there needs to be closure for her character. Sarabhai vs Sarabhai remains one of the most beloved TV shows, and Rupali continues to impress fans with her performance in Anupamaa.
